medical_history.chief_complaint: Fatigue, generalized weakness, and subacute dyspnea on exertion.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient's symptoms began several weeks ago, characterized by dyspnea on exertion. The fatigue and generalized weakness have worsened, particularly after bending over to pick up a plant, leading to severe weakness and inability to pull himself up. Patient also reported persistent respiratory issues, nausea (without emesis), and concurrent symptoms of dyspnea on exertion and sore throat.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Atrial fibrillation, renal transplant, Crohn's disease, hypertension, hyperparathyroidism (status post parathyroidectomy), and adrenal insufficiency.
medical_history.family_history: Father with cerebral aneurysm; mother with hypertension, arthritis, and diverticulosis; other siblings with cerebral aneurysms.
